metadata.title: About the Windows version of the PCDC driver for the RZ/A1 microprocessor

sections.content:
Question:
Is the following driver necessary on the PC side?
USB Peripheral Communications Device Class Driver (PCDC) (renesas.com)
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/rza1h-group-usb-peripheral-communications-device-class-driver-pcdc
Answer:
Yes. A Windows standard COM driver is available.
Suitable Products
RZ/A1

Is the following driver necessary on the PC side?
USB Peripheral Communications Device Class Driver (PCDC) (renesas.com)
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/rza1h-group-usb-peripheral-communications-device-class-driver-pcdc

Is the following driver necessary on the PC side?
USB Peripheral Communications Device Class Driver (PCDC) (renesas.com)

Answer:
Yes. A Windows standard COM driver is available.
Suitable Products
RZ/A1
Yes. A Windows standard COM driver is available.
Yes. A Windows standard COM driver is available.
